text: Sophie Blanchard (also Madame Blanchard; 25 March 1778 â€” 6 July 1819) was a French aeronaut and wife of ballooning pioneer Jean-Pierre Blanchard. She made many balloon flights. Blanchard died at age 41. After a major accident in which her balloon caught fire, she fell to her death. She had been born in Paris. title: Sophie Blanchard
